full_transcript: Doctor, Somnirel is built on sleep science. It uses the Aether-blend to enhance Stage 3 NREM sleep. Unlike synthetics, it doesn't cause a morning hangover. It's about architecture, not just sedation. Patients wake up refreshed and ready for their day.
